com.vangav.backend.push_notifications.apple

Class AppleNotification.AppleNotificationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.push_notifications.apple.AppleNotification.AppleNotificationBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    AppleNotification

    public static class AppleNotification.AppleNotificationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    MANDATORY, the only way to create an AppleNotification is to use this builder AppleNotificationBuilder: is a builder for ApplePushNotification, all class member variables are optional except for deviceToken Usage example: AppleNotification appleNotification = AppleNotification .AppleNotificationBuilder( "740f4707bebcf74f9b7c25d48e3358945f6aa01da5ddb387462c7eaf61bb78ad") .badgeNumber(5) .alertBody("John sent you a new message") .build();

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppleNotificationBuilder(java.lang.String deviceToken)
      Constructor AppleNotificationBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AppleNotification.AppleNotificationBuilder addCustomProperty(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      addCustomProperty adds a custom property
      AppleNotification.AppleNotificationBuilder alertBody(java.lang.String alertBody)
      alertBody sets the message that appears as part of the notification (e.g.: on the iPhone's lock screen)
      AppleNotification.AppleNotificationBuilder badgeNumber(int badgeNumber)
      badgeNumber sets badge number value (badge number is the number in the red circle on an app's icon as new notifications are received for that app)
      AppleNotification build()
      build
      AppleNotification.AppleNotificationBuilder customProperties(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customProperties)
      customProperties sets values for the receiving app to use while processing this notification
      AppleNotification.AppleNotificationBuilder sound(java.lang.String sound)
      sound sets a custom sound for this notification to override the default one or sets sound to a silent one

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
